list.name: Beş Kasen'in İhtişamı: Sumizome
list.desc: Ayaka found this on a flower stand at the festival venue. This sheet of paper, however, only contains one line of text.

list.name: Beş Kasen'in İhtişamı: Suikou
list.desc: A sheet of paper Venti found in a cargo crate within the wharf warehouse. A poem entitled "The Five Kasen's Splendor: Suikou" is written upon it.

list.name: Beş Kasen'in İhtişamı: Aoi no Okina
list.desc: A sheet of paper Xingqiu found beneath his luggage. Someone seems to have left it there while he was napping. A poem entitled "The Five Kasen's Splendor: Aoi no Okina" is written upon it.

list.name: Beş Kasen'in İhtişamı: Akahito
list.desc: A sheet of paper that some mysterious person left behind. This person must have originally intended to leave it on Kazuha's person, only to be unexpectedly detected by the latter and forced to flee in a hurry, leaving the sheet behind. A poem entitled "The Five Kasen's Splendor: Akahito" is written upon it.

list.name: "Doğu'nun Valisi" Üzerine Tartışmalar
list.desc: The "Viceroy of the East," or "Touzannou" sung of in Watatsumi folk tradition is also known as the "Akuou" all across Raiden's domains. He was the first vassal ruler of the Great Serpent Orobashi, and he was also the last.

list.name: Aile Mektubu
list.desc: The page has already yellowed and become incredibly brittle. A single touch might break it.

list.name: Koş Dodoko, Koş!
list.desc: Message From the Editor: "Let's Go, Dodoco!" is the combined work of an older girl and a younger girl. Every chapter brims with their gentleness and good wishes, as the story is intended as a gift to our readers. I hope this book — in spite of its small volume — can bring you some simple joy after a long day of work.

list.name: Krallar ve Klanlar Tarihi: Başlangıç
list.desc: A comprehensive history of Mondstadt edited and compiled by the Northland History Society.

list.name: Bin Yıllık Yalnızlık
list.desc: The beginning of the Springvale Hunter's tragic fantasy journey. Where did misfortune first befall him? What marks the start and finish of the 1000-year journey of loneliness? Let this first volume of 1000 Years of Loneliness be your guide through the fantastical fog that is the life of Gothson.

list.name: Gunnhildr'ın Biyografisi
list.desc: A history book on the life of the apical ancestor of the Gunnhildr Clan compiled by Eckhart Gunnhildr, a modern historian of Mondstadt. It consists of fragmented stories and legends from the aristocratic period.

list.name: Antik Keşif Günlükleri - Bölüm I
list.desc:
An investigation journal found in front of the ruins with a circular entrance.
Its author seems to have been a member of the aristocracy that once ruled Mondstadt.

list.name: Antik Keşif Günlükleri - Bölüm III
list.desc:
An investigation journal found in the camp on the sunny side of Dragonspine.
Its author seems to have been a member of the aristocracy that once ruled Mondstadt.

list.name: Antik Keşif Günlükleri - Bölüm II
list.desc:
An investigation journal found in the basement of the ice-covered ruins.
Its author seems to have been a member of the aristocracy that once ruled Mondstadt.

list.name: Tianheng Mizahı
list.desc: A poetry collection by Pingshan, The Mystic. The quality of the poems is all over the place, but it has long been a reference book for young poets or poet-wannabes in Liyue.

list.name: Toprak Hükümdarı Efsanesi: Ocak Tanrısı
list.desc: Stories about the Geo Archon as the God of the Stove.

list.name: Tapınak Görevlisi Mouun'un Yaşamı
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/book/The Life of Mouun the Shrine Maiden_icon.png
list.desc: For the people of Watatsumi, the legends of the Archon War are always filled with bitterness. Many of these millennia-old folksongs tell of a shrine maiden by the name of Mouun, who once rode upon the back of a sea monster, following the Great Serpent unto a tragic, moving end.

list.name: Açılmış Mektup
list.desc: A letter that seems brand new but that has already been opened. It gives off a light sakura scent.

list.name: Yakshalar: Muhafız Adeptuslar
list.desc: A volume out of the "Wonders and Folklore of Liyue" collection, which serves as Liyue's own version of "Tour of the Land of Liyue," an encyclopedia of folk beliefs and customs by Masudi, a scholar from Sumeru. Due to the archaic nature of the author's writing style, it was largely dismissed by the public and publishers alike. "Yakshas: The Guardian Adepti" introduces the readers to the various yakshas who fought side-by-side with the Geo Archon.

list.name: Lütfen Kitsune Guuji!
list.desc: A popular light novel in Inazuma which tells the story of the "good-for-nothing" Shogun and the "good-at-everything" Kitsune Guuji. The novel is in the same collection as "Shogun Almighty: Reborn as Raiden With Unlimited Power," but not by the same author. What they share in common, however, is their popularity.

list.name: Kaedehara Yoshinori'nin Mektubu
list.desc:
A blank piece of paper that was hidden in an old flower pot. When dipped in water, it reveals a long-sealed secret.
After telling everyone about the truth that was concealed within, Kazuha said that "this letter may still be of use to you," before handing it over to you.

list.name: Yıpranmış Mektup
list.desc: Someone's private thoughts are written in this tattered letter. Unfortunately, the years have eaten away at the words that were penned until they became blurred, and if not for someone having dug it up, these past events may have forever slept under the soil.

list.name: Denge Dizeleri
list.desc: Legend has that it contains ancient incantations used to pay respects to Rex Lapis and the yaksha adepti. It also serves as a historical record of the ancient belief in the Geo Archon.

list.name: Sangonomiya Günlükleri
list.desc: Historical annals written by the famous Shogunate historian Kujou Michizane, who was known as one of the "The Three Kujou Dignitaries," or "The Great Calligrapher." It chronicles the history of Watatsumi Island in broad strokes.

list.name: Teyvat'ın İncisi
list.desc: This scroll, which seems to be a part of a larger series, belongs to the Jade Chamber's invaluable collection of written works. This volume is a dissertation on Liyue Harbor's economic policy.

list.name: Soluk Prenses ve Altı Cüceler
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/book/The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies_icon.png

list.name: Taş Tablet Derlemeleri: Cilt I
list.desc: A history book compiled and translated from ancient stone tablets of Liyue by the historian Zichang. It contains various fragmented historical events.

list.name: Kutsal Kiraz Ağacı Arınma Rehberi
list.desc: A tattered scroll containing information related to the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual. Some pages seem to bear the cinnabar seal of some shrine.

list.name: Inaba Tousaburou Kyuuzou'nun Son Sözleri
list.desc: A letter filled with words from margin to margin. Its author has gone missing.

list.name: Yüce Arataki ve Görkemli Vur Patlasın Festivali!
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/book/The Almighty Arataki Great and Glorious Drumalong Festival!_icon.png
list.desc: This is a most lavish invitation letter, whether in its construction or its content. The letter describes a large-scale, deep-rooted, nationally-acclaimed event in which you shall be a most important guest, the radiant star of the show.

list.name: Eczacının Notları (I)
list.desc: Notes left by Yasumoto. They still smell strongly of Naku Weed.

list.name: Eczacının Notları (III)
list.desc: Notes left by Yasumoto. It shows some signs of blotching and water damage.

list.name: Eczacının Notları (II)
list.desc: Notes left by Yasumoto. It has been conscientiously protected from rain damage.

list.name: Yüce Şogun: Sınırsız Bir Güçle Yeniden Doğan Raiden
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/book/Shogun Almighty: Reborn as Raiden With Unlimited Power_icon.png
list.desc: A popular light novel in Inazuma which tells the story of a mere mortal suddenly turning into the Raiden Shogun. The story is well-received for its novel plot and has inspired many light novelists.

list.name: Linling'in Şiir Seçkisi
list.desc: A collection of poetry that Linling published at her own expense. It is her first publication, and she is very proud of it.

list.name: Dövüş Sanatları
list.desc: A standalone volume from the light novel series "Onibudou," written by Junkichi, a writer with Yae Publishing House. This collection contains the first two major arcs in the story. The quality of the serialized version varies quite a bit, but it still enjoys a degree of popularity amongst readers.

list.name: Ruhun Işığına Bir Kaside
list.desc: Lore reportedly passed down within a lost religious group in the desert. Someone has transcribed it into a script.

list.name: Remuria'nın Gerileme ve Çöküş Tarihi
list.desc: Büyük bilgin Pulteney'in antik Remurya uygarlığına ilişkin bu destansı tarihi eseri Fontaine'in kuruluşunun ilk yıllarında yazdığı söylenir.
